title: News24.com | FACT CHECK: How a lie about Bill Gates and a vaccine for the coronavirus exploded on Twitter
description: A lie about IT billionaire and philanthropist Bill Gates wanting to test a Covid-19 vaccine in Africa has exploded on social media across the world over the past two weeks, resulting in widespread outrage on Twitter.
content:
A lie about IT billionaire and philanthropist Bill Gates wanting to test a Covid-19 vaccine in Africa exploded on social media across the world over the past two weeks, resulting in widespread outrage on Twitter.
